import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { content } from '../hooks/index' const CreateNew = (props) => { const navigate = useNavigate() const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() props.addNew({ content, author, info, votes: 0 }) // 7.3: routed anecdotes, step3 navigate('/') props.showNotification(content, 5) } return (

create a new anecdote

content setContent(e.target.value)} />
author setAuthor(e.target.value)} />
url for more info setInfo(e.target.value)} />
) } export default CreateNew
